aboutMe.topText: Hi, my name is Michael Pierce. I am a lifelong learner and a tech tinkerer, ever since my family's first Windows 3.1 computer. Since then, I have pursued a variety of digital hobbies, from video editing to audio production to video games. Through these hobbies, I have learned how to learn. I know how to teach myself from online and text resources, and how to teach others.
aboutMe.bottomText: While I was pursuing game development as a hobby, I fell in love with programming. This is why I decided to go back to school at New Brunswick Community College for Web and Mobile Application Development. Between my education and my personal projects, I have experience with the following:

projects.projectDescription: A Flutter application that allows users to view available animals for adoption. Shelter staff have access to a special Admin panel that allows them to add, remove, or modify any listed animals.
features: Android, iOS, and Web supported via Flutter framework
Provider pattern using the Provider Flutter package
Responsive UI that supports phone, tablet, and desktop
User Authentication via Google, Email/Password, or Anonymous via Firebase
Uploadable images are stored to Google Cloud

projects.projectDescription: A small Windows Forms app to demonstrate CRUD features. This project was done collaboratively with a small team.
features: Create, update, and delete booking agents, hotels, rooms, guest profiles, and bookings
Implimented business rules via SQL constraints and validation
Git used to merge contributions and version control
